about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Jericho rank 15 cover frigate “Ronin”
  • Active module Field generator “Shadow of Bartle”
  • Special title “Deadly predator” — for destroying multiple enemy ships and dealing significant damage to enemy bases.
  • Special ammunition against aliens — “Resonating crystal”, “Resonating charges”, “Resonating slugs” — 30 pcs.
  • Special missiles “Crystal drone” — 30 pcs.
  • Portrait “Charlie Angel”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 14 days!

The cover frigate “Ronin” was the last development of Jericho family Liu scientists before it was destroyed. Along with the destruction of the Monolith, the laboratories in which this powerful machine was developed also disappeared. Fortunately, the blueprints of the ship have been saved, and it was possible to recreate “Ronin” using them. However, scientists from other families have not been able to understand exactly how this machine works. It is unlikely that they will be able to create anything similar in the near future. The first ships of this series were received by the few surviving Liu warriors, who, having lost their master and their home, set off on a journey through the Galaxy. One of these warriors joined the mercenaries and handed over the blueprints of his ship to the UMC for his new brothers.

It was created for the most desperate pilots. A ship that can change the outcome of any battle. High-tech armour, large-caliber weapons, and the ability to defend itself from missiles and projectiles make it invincible. “Ronin” is an invincible machine and you can become its pilot.

name: Star Conflict - Ronin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
